query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name,
  c.slug,
  c.parentId,
  COUNT(pc.productId) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId
WHERE c.slug = 'chromatography-supplies'
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug, c.parentId;
